descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.abload.de/img/screenshot1131rc0z.png[/img]

[size=8]Wolf Armor.  Better.[/size]

I love the Companion\'s storyline, and I needed to make my Skyrim husbando Farkas look properly badass, hence this reskin.  Diffuse and normal maps re-done and changed the color scheme more to my preference.  It now matches up well with Wuuthrad, the quest reward battleaxe, and daedric weapons.

Installation
==========
You know the drill, drag and drop to your Skyrim data folder.
To uninstall, remove files from the /textures/armor/wolf folder.

Places to Acquire
================
- coc qasmoke room in the regular armor chest
- via console commands 
chest: player.additem 000cae15 1
boots: player.additem 000cee7c 1
gauntlets: player.additem 000cee7e 1
helmet: player.additem 0004c3d0 1

[img]http://www.abload.de/img/screenshot129hdksg.png[/img]

<3 Other Mods Shown
====================
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21540]Vilkas and Farkas by Netherwalk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20741]PINEAPPLEVISION ENB Dark[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486]Winter is Coming - Cloaks[/url]

Featured by BDMods.  Thanks so much!

[youtube]kE9G9N1jrho[/youtube]
author: ELE08
